evolutions.name: Vampire Lord
evolutions.description: Each hit inflicts 3 stacks of bleed. Heals 1 health and consumes all stacks when hitting an enemy with at least 10 stacks of bleed

evolutions.name: Leech
evolutions.description: Attaches up to 1 leech onto enemies it hits, which adds 2 stacks of bleed per second (max 24 stacks)

evolutions.name: Virus
evolutions.description: Applies 1 stack of disease to units it hits (max 8 stacks). Disease lasts for 6 seconds. Each stack of disease deals 3-6 damage per second and diseased units have a 15% chance of passing a stack to undiseased nearby enemies each second

evolutions.name: Berserk
evolutions.description: Each hit has a 30% chance of causing enemies to go berserk for 6 seconds. Berserk enemies deal 15-24 damage to adjacent enemies every second

evolutions.name: Sacrifice
evolutions.description: Inflicts 4 stacks of bleed (max 15 stacks) and applies curse to hit enemies. Cursed enemies are dealt 50-100 after being hit 5 times

evolutions.name: Hemorrhage
evolutions.description: Inflicts 3 stacks of bleed. When hitting an enemy with 12 stacks of bleed or more, consume all stacks of bleed to deal 20% of their current health

evolutions.name: Leech
evolutions.description: Attaches up to 1 leech on to enemies it hits, which adds 2 stacks of bleed per second (max 24 stacks)

evolutions.name: Maggot
evolutions.description: Infest enemies on hit with maggots. When they die, they explode into 1-2 baby balls

evolutions.name: Spider Queen
evolutions.description: Has a 25% chance of birthing an Egg Sac each time it hits an enemy

evolutions.name: Mosquito King
evolutions.description: Spawns a mosquito each time it hits an enemy. Mosquitos attack a random enemy, dealing 80-120 damage each. If a mosquito kills an enemy, they steal 1 health

evolutions.name: Bomb
evolutions.description: Explodes when hitting an enemy, dealing 150-300 damage to nearby enemies. Has a 3-second cooldown before it can be shot again

evolutions.name: Magma
evolutions.description: Emits lava blobs over time. Enemies who walk into lava blobs are dealt 15-30 damage and gain 1 stack of burn (max 3 stacks). Burn lasts for 3 seconds, dealing 3-8 damage per stack per second. This ball and its lava blobs also deal 6-12 damage to nearby units

evolutions.name: Inferno
evolutions.description: Applies 1 stack of burn every second to all enemies within a 2 tile radius. Burn lasts for 6 seconds, dealing 3-7 damage per stack per second

evolutions.name: Berserk
evolutions.description: Each hit has a 30% chance of causing enemies to go berserk for 6 seconds. Berserk enemies deal 15-24 damage to adjacent enemies every second

evolutions.name: Sun
evolutions.description: Blind all enemies in view and add 1 stack of burn every second (max 5 stacks). Burn lasts for 6 seconds and deals 6-12 damage per stack per second

evolutions.name: Frozen Flame
evolutions.description: Add 1 stack of frostburn on hit for 20 seconds (max 4 stacks). Frostburnt units are dealt 8-12 damage per stack per second and receive 25% more damage from other sources

evolutions.name: Maggot
evolutions.description: Infest enemies on hit with maggots. When they die, they explode into 1-2 baby balls

evolutions.name: Overgrowth
evolutions.description: Applies 1 stack of overgrowth. Upon reaching 3, consume all stacks and deal 0-200 damage to all enemies in a 3x3 tile square

evolutions.name: Radiation Beam
evolutions.description: Emit a radiation beam on hit that deals 24-48 damage and applies 1 stack of radiation (max 5 stacks). Radiation lasts for 15 seconds and causes enemies to receive 10% more damage from all sources per stack

evolutions.name: Voluptuous
evolutions.description: Explodes into 2-3 egg sacs on hitting an enemy. Has a 3-second cooldown before it can be shot again

evolutions.description: Applies 1 stack of disease to units it hits (max 8 stacks). Disease lasts for 6 seconds. Each stack of disease deals 3-6 damage per second and diseased units have a 15% chance of passing a stack to undiseased nearby enemies each second

evolutions.name: Succubus
evolutions.description: Each hit has a 4% chance of charming the enemy for 9 seconds. Heals 1 when hitting a charmed enemy

evolutions.description: Passes through the front of enemies, but not the back. Backstabs deal 30% bonus damage

evolutions.description: Instantly kills the first non-boss enemy that it hits, but destroys itself afterwards. Has a 7-second cooldown before it can be shot again

evolutions.name: Nixious
evolutions.description: Passes through enemies and applies 3 stacks of poison to nearby enemies within a 2 tile radius. Poison lasts for 4 seconds and each stack deals 1-3 damage per second

evolutions.name: Flicker
evolutions.description: Deals 1-7 damage to every enemy on screen ever 1.4 seconds

evolutions.description: Leaves behind tar blobs over time. Enemies who walk into tar blobs are dealt 15-30, are slowed by 50% for 7 seconds and gain 1 stack of poison (max 8 stacks). Each stack of poison deals 1-3 damage per second. This ball and its tar blobs also deal 6-12 damage to nearby units

evolutions.name: Glacier
evolutions.description: Releases glacial spikes over time that deal 15-30 damage to enemies that touch them and freeze them for 2.0 seconds. This ball and its glacial spikes also deal 6-12 damage to nearby units

evolutions.description: Goes through enemies and is surrounded by a raging storm dealing 10-20 damage per second and blinding nearby enemies for 3 seconds
